programme.title: This Cultural Life
programme.desc: Actor and film-maker Sir Kenneth Branagh talks to John Wilson about the key influences and inspirations that have shaped his own work. He reveals some of his formative artistic experiences and discusses his creative process.

programme.title: Black Box Diaries
programme.desc: Journalist Shiori Ito conducts an investigation into her own sexual assault, aiming to bring the prominent perpetrator to justice. Her pursuit evolves into a significant legal case, revealing the antiquated judicial and societal frameworks in Japan.

programme.title: Talking Pictures
programme.desc: A retrospective look at television appearances made over the years by `Some Like It Hot' and `Days of Wine and Roses' star Jack Lemmon, with interviews from the archive and classic clips capturing the milestones and highlights of his life and career.

programme.title: Archaeology: A Secret History
programme.desc: Archaeologist Richard Miles shows how discoveries in the 18th and 19th centuries overturned ideas of when and where civilisation began, as empires competed to `own' the past.

programme.title: ABBA at the BBC
programme.desc: This compilation is a must-see for all ABBA fans and includes great archive interviews, promos and performances of some of ABBA's classics, including `Waterloo', `Dancing Queen', and `Thank You for the Music'.

programme.title: ABBA: Against All Odds
programme.desc: After their unexpected Eurovision win of 1974, ABBA go on to conquer the charts worldwide, becoming one of the biggest selling music groups of all time. Rare archive footage and interviews bring their journey to life in 2024, fifty years on.

programme.title: The Joy of ABBA
programme.desc: Between 1974 and 1982 ABBA plundered the Anglo-Saxon charts, but divided critical opinion. This documentary explores how they raised the bar for pop music as a form and made us fall in love with the sound of Swedish melancholy.

programme.title: All Creatures Great & Small

programme.title: Wisting
programme.desc: Wisting's hunt for a killer in his cold case means he needs to question a second man in prison for murder. This leads him all the way to Lithuania and a collaboration with Interpol.

programme.title: Wisting

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: With their entire belongings in two rucksacks, today's couple have spent the last six years travelling the globe. With £325,000 the pair have decided they need a base in the Wiltshire countryside, and Alistair Appleton is the man to show them what this gorgeous county has to offer. Alistair also meets an intensive care nurse at her much loved and fruitful allotment.

programme.title: The Travelling Auctioneers

programme.title: The Repair Shop: On the Road
programme.sub-title: Yorkshire - Crumbling York Minster Gets Rescued
programme.desc: The boys help save a monument that is crumbling before their eyes. Will brings a huge drum back to the barn, and Dom gets on the tools with the last scissor-maker in Sheffield.

programme.title: Pointless

programme.desc: Maritime Inn landlady Pat gets her first full house of the season as Brixham's tourist trade picks up for the summer - but refuses to hire anyone to help her with the extra work. Powerboat instructor Mike Weatherbee tries to enforce the laws of the sea, carpet-cleaner Dave Satchwill prepares to lead the town's popular ghost tour, and lone fisherman Dave Brown reveals his unusual methods

programme.title: Fish Town
programme.desc: August arrives and the fishermen of Brixham spend time ashore with their families as their boats are repaired - but summer proves costly for Jan, who loses £1,000 for every day his vessel is out of action. Apprentice deckhand Logan has to decide whether a life at sea is the right choice for him and his family, and seafood seller Jenny receives a surprise on her 65th birthday

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony leaves town with Paulie after hearing the FBI is digging at the site where he buried an enemy. The pair reminisce about old times as they drive, but Tony becomes increasingly frustrated by his associate's overly detailed anecdotes. Meanwhile, Junior's doctors increase his medication after he brawls with Professor Lynch. Starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Tony is bitten by the gambling bug and urges Carmela to stake her property profits on the Jets. AJ proposes to Blanca, promising he will rise from pizzeria night manager to restaurant chain owner, and Marie asks for help when she reaches the end of her tether with the rebellious Vito Jr. Meanwhile, Hesh makes a devastating discovery. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini and Edie Falco

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: Bobby Axelrod reaches a major milestone, and Chuck struggles to get his bearings as he and Wendy navigate a new normal

programme.title: Billions
programme.sub-title: The Chris Rock Test Season 5, Episode 2
programme.desc: Chuck wrestles with his demons and chooses a new path. Meanwhile, Wendy takes the lead as Axe Camp faces a new threat

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Hound is judged by the gods, while Jaime receives a different form of justice at the hands of men. Robb is betrayed, Jon proves himself and Tyrion learns the true cost of a wedding. Fantasy drama, starring Richard Madden, Kit Harington and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Big Love
programme.sub-title: Where There's a Will Season 1, Episode 11
programme.desc: Following her confrontation with sister Cindy, Barb decides to amend her will so that Ben, Sarah and Tancy would live with Bill's other wives if their parents were to die. However, when she puts the idea to Nicki and Margene, the three women end up criticising each other's parenting skills. Meanwhile, Bill considers becoming a member of a high-flying businessmen's clique. Bill Paxton stars

programme.title: Big Love
programme.desc: Wanda retaliates to indirect threats from Alby by poisoning him with anti-freeze, only for Bill to be blamed by Roman. Meanwhile, Barb prepares for the Beehive Mother of the Year Ceremony, unaware a mysterious phone caller is trying to ruin the event for her. Bill Paxton and Jeanne Tripplehorn star

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.sub-title: When You're Lost in the Darkness Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: Twenty years after modern civilisation has been destroyed, a hardened survivor is hired to smuggle a 14-year-old girl out of an oppressive quarantine zone. What starts as a small job soon becomes a brutal, heartbreaking journey, as they both must traverse the US and depend on each other for survival. Starring Pedro Pascal and Bella Ramsey

programme.title: The Wire
programme.desc: Colvin manages to put off a newspaper reporter inquiring about the free zones, but realises he has to report his policy to Burrell. When the unit's wiretaps go dead after just a few days, Freamon devises an ingenious solution and ropes Bubbles in to help. Avon refuses to accept Stringer's advice to follow the co-op's proposal for a truce with Marlo, while Brother Mouzone returns to Baltimore on a mission of revenge and searches for Omar

programme.title: Mussolini: Son of the Century
programme.desc: As Mussolini founds the Fasces of Combat, D'Annunzio takes Fiume. Mussolini hopes to exploit the feat of his poet on the field. Drama, starring Luca Marinelli. In Italian, with subtitles

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Two days after D-Day, Easy Company is ordered to take the town of Carentan, a battle that results in casualties despite its apparent success. The battalion is finally sent to England after 36 days in Normandy, but the respite proves short-lived as the orders come to move out again

programme.title: The Gilded Age
programme.desc: George heads to Pittsburgh to deal with the potential strike, while Bertha learns that the Duke will return for the Metropolitan Opera's opening night. Bannister tries to retrieve an incriminating letter from the Russell house

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: The Hound is judged by the gods, while Jaime receives a different form of justice at the hands of men. Robb is betrayed, Jon proves himself and Tyrion learns the true cost of a wedding. Fantasy drama, starring Richard Madden, Kit Harington and Peter Dinklage

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming discovers more little-known facts on a journey between Smithfields and Spitalfields, two of London's most famous markets. He begins with a fry-up breakfast before visiting the remains of a Roman amphitheatre and investigating a mysterious secret in a Liverpool Street hotel, as well as meeting former EastEnders star Larry Lamb (Archie Mitchell)

programme.title: Urban Secrets
programme.desc: Alan Cumming explores Newcastle, discovering strange sounds by the river and finding out how traditional culture is being reinterpreted in the Byker district. He goes behind the scenes at Newcastle United with local football hero Peter Beardsley, learns about the history of adult comic Viz from former editor Simon Donald and accompanies comedienne Sarah Millican to her favourite part of the city

programme.title: Richard E Grant's Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor explores Berlin, visiting the arty Propeller Island City Lodge - a hotel where guests can fulfil their fantasies by sleeping in lion cages, coffins or rotating beds. At the Schlosshotel in affluent Grunewald, cabaret dancer Romy Haag talks to Richard about her affair with David Bowie, who stayed at the hotel while living in the German capital in the 1970s

programme.title: Richard E Grant's Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor heads to New Orleans and meets soul singer Irma Thomas at the Hotel de Monteleone, an establishment that was popular with writers such as Tennessee Williams, F Scott Fitzgerald and Ernest Hemingway. Richard speaks to Steel Magnolias author Robert Harling about the Soniat House, check into the supposedly haunted Hotel Maison de Ville and talks to burlesque dancer Chrissy Owens at the Roosevelt

programme.title: Richard E Grant's Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: The actor heads to Tokyo and checks out the Park Hyatt, the hotel featured in the film Lost in Translation, and goes behind the closed doors of the Japanese capital's love hotels. In the fashionable district of Meguro, Richard takes in the Claska, which was the city's first boutique hotel and has its own canine beauty salon

programme.title: Richard E Grant's Hotel Secrets
programme.desc: Richard E Grant travels to Venice, said to be the city with the highest concentration of luxury hotels on the planet. He discovers how a measuring error led to the building of the city's biggest swimming pool, tries out a 15,000 euro-a-night royal suite whose bed has been slept in by everyone from the Beckhams to Prince Charles and the Duchess of Cornwall, and visits a hotel that keeps its doors open even when water floods to knee height. He also finds out why breaking a window once earned Ernest Hemingway a 10 per cent discount on his room

programme.title: Big Love
programme.desc: Nicki plans an extravagant party for Wayne, but Bill refuses to allow her father to attend. He also takes steps to protect his house from Roman, who forces one of the hardware store employees to hand over $22,000. Lois voices her disapproval of her son's third marriage, and Frank remains convinced his wife is trying to kill him. Bill Paxton and Chloe Sevigny star

programme.title: Big Love
programme.desc: Sarah tells Heather about her unusual family, and the other wives are not happy when Barb gets a job. Nicki comes under pressure from credit card companies, and turns to her unimpressed father for help. Bill is troubled by disturbing dreams his friend Don believes are messages from God, which inspire him to make a decision about Roman. Starring Bill Paxton

programme.title: Big Love
programme.desc: Bill and Barb begins secretly sleeping together on the other wives' nights - leaving Nicki convinced he is looking for a fourth spouse. Details emerge of a land fraud orchestrated by Roman, and the hardware store owner decides to report his father-in-law to the authorities. Margene strikes up a friendship with a neighbour, and Benny seeks a cure for his obsession with sex

programme.title: Big Love
programme.desc: Bill attends the funeral of his father's first wife, but finds his mother has been shunned by the community and denied the legal marriage that would traditionally be her right. Nicki decides she wants another child, and is accused of identity theft when she tries to claim a discount at Home Plus using Barb's card. Ben worries about Margene's friendship with Pam

programme.title: Big Love
programme.desc: Bill reports Roman to the attorney general's 'polygamy tsar', but the Prophet responds by evicting Frank and Joey from their homes. Barb finds out about Nicki's debts, and almost lets slip her unusual family arrangement to a pair of missionaries. Sarah brings Heather home unannounced, Margene attends Pam's church social and Ben is confused by his friends' behaviour at the seminary

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Artie reaches crisis point as his business starts to go under in the face of fierce competition from a new restaurant. Meanwhile, Christopher and Little Carmine head west to pursue their new idea for a film, but become obsessed with stealing celebrity goodie bags, and Tony decides to take a break from the hunt for Vito. Guest starring Ben Kingsley and Lauren Bacall

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: AJ causes problems for his family as he tries to better his life, and a visit to see Junior at the mental institute lands him in trouble with the police. Vito gains an admirer while hiding out in New Hampshire, and Tony is presented with a tempting real-estate offer

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Paulie organises the annual Feast of St Elzear, but his thrifty nature almost ruins the occasion. Christopher makes a surprise announcement, before he and Tony get involved in a shoot-out with a gang of bikers. Carmela tells Liz La Cerva who she thinks was responsible for Adriana's death. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Johnny Sack's trial begins and he refuses to bargain with anyone, while Bobby sustains a serious eye injury during a shooting. Just as things appear to be going well for Vito, he reaches the end of his tether with Jim and pines for his old lifestyle. Tony becomes jealous of Carmela and does his best to ruin her house plans. Gritty crime drama, starring James Gandolfini

programme.title: The Sopranos
programme.desc: Carmela's trip to Paris with Rosalie presents her with a new outlook on life and Meadow decides to move west with Finn. Phil presses Tony to have Vito killed, AJ is placed in a predicament and Fat Dom makes the fatal mistake of telling one joke too many. Edie Falco and Jamie-Lynn Sigler star

programme.title: Riviera
programme.desc: Daphne reveals to Georgina how worthless Nico makes her feel. Elsewhere, Gloria confesses her suspicion that Enrique killed his lover

programme.title: Riviera
programme.desc: Georgina wakes up in a remote psychiatric facility after being forcibly sectioned, and feeling trapped and angry, she vows to seek revenge on Alex and Ellen

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.desc: In King's Landing, Sansa grows in confidence under the watchful eye of the Machiavellian Lord Baelish, while Tyrion is after his just reward for the part he played in the Battle of the Blackwater. In the far North, Jon Snow is brought before formidable wildling leader Mance Rayder (Ciaran Hinds) and attempts to earn the trust of the King-beyond-the-Wall. Across the Narrow Sea, Daenerys Targaryen arrives in Slaver's Bay with adviser Ser Jorah Mormont looking to form an army. Fantasy drama based on George RR Martin's A Song of Ice and Fire series of novels, starring Peter Dinklage, Emilia Clarke and Kit Harington

programme.title: Game of Thrones
programme.sub-title: Dark Wings, Dark Words Season 3, Episode 2
programme.desc: In King's Landing, Shae sneaks into Tyrion's chamber to tell him Ros warned her about Baelish's interest in Sansa, who goes to tea with Margaery and her grandmother Lady Olenna and is encouraged to speak freely about Joffrey. Jaime passes the time by taunting his escort Brienne, Arya encounters outlaw group the Brotherhood Without Banners, while Lord Karstark makes Robb aware he no longer has faith in him. Fantasy drama, guest starring Diana Rigg

programme.title: Darkman
programme.desc: A hideously scarred scientist wants to exact revenge on the thugs who disfigured him. With the discovery of a revolutionary synthetic skin, Dr Peyton Westlake refashions himself as the shadowy avenger `Darkman', hiding away from his former life in an abandoned building and only taking to the streets in disguise.

programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.desc: During the last days of World War II, a solitary prospector crosses paths with Nazis on a scorched-Earth retreat in northern Finland. When the soldiers decide to steal his gold, they quickly discover they just tangled with no ordinary miner.

A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar', in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted
programme.desc: Melman, Alex, Marty and Gloria are back and still trying to make it back to New York. When their journey brings them to Europe, they use a travelling circus as the perfect cover. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! The Sword and the Scoob
programme.desc: After Shaggy discovers his ancestors came from England, an evil sorceress transports the gang back to the age of chivalrous knights, spell-casting wizards, and terrifying fire-breathing dragons.

programme.title: The Adventures of Tom Thumb & Thumbelina
programme.desc: Two infants are abducted from the kingdom of little people in the heart of the magical forest, and taken away with a travelling circus. The boy, Tom Thumb, manages to escape, but Thumbelina is left captive. When she breaks free, she bumps into Tom Thumb, who she doesn't recognise except for noticing that he is also only six inches tall.

programme.title: Robo-Dog: Airborne
programme.desc: After the robot canine goes missing, his friend Tyler vows to turn the town upside town to find him. Family adventure sequel, starring Michael Campion and Patrick Muldoon

programme.title: The Horse Dancer
programme.desc: A promising young gymnast starts a horse-dancing team to raise money for a horse camp that is being threatened with closure. Family drama, starring Sophie Bolen and Kristen Ryda

programme.title: Batteries Not Included
programme.desc: A family of tiny alien spacecraft intervenes to help the residents of a run-down Manhattan brownstone tenement stop greedy developers from demolishing their homes. However, the miniature flying saucers have the odds stacked against them as they bravely do all they can to save the day. Sci-fi fantasy, starring Jessica Tandy, Hume Cronyn, Frank McRae and Elizabeth Pena.

programme.title: The Cinema List
programme.desc: Get comfy as we discover some of the best films to bring the family together with. From Men in Black to Barbie, there's something here for everyone!

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: An all-American family adopts a huge St Bernard, but the father is dismayed when it turns into a one-dog disaster zone. He insists the mutt must go to a new home, but when it is kidnapped by a crooked vet, dad has a change of heart and races to the rescue. Comedy, starring Charles Grodin, Bonnie Hunt, Oliver Platt and David Duchovny

programme.title: Step Dogs
programme.desc: The fur flies when a pampered California pooch is sent to live with a wise cracking farm hound. However, when a couple of bumbling thieves attempt to break into their home, they must put aside their differences to defend their home. Family comedy, starring Joris Jarsky, Ryan Belleville and Dylan Schmid

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: The Daughters of Atlas, aka Hespera, Kalypso and Anthea, arrive on Earth in search of stolen magic. The vengeful ancient gods threaten humanity, and the only brave souls standing in their destructive path are Shazam and his brightly costumed compatriots. Superhero sequel, starring Zachary Levi and Helen Mirren

programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honour Among Thieves
programme.desc: Following the death of his wife, lute-playing bard Edgin abandons a noble pledge and turns to petty thievery with his surrogate sister, exiled barbarian Holga. The duo recruit self-doubting sorcerer Simon and incorrigible rogue Forge to their merry gang. A plan to steal the fabled Scroll of Reawakening backfires and Edgin is incarcerated with Holga on charges of grand larceny and skulduggery. Action adventure, starring Chris Pine, Michelle Rodriguez, Justice Smith, Sophia Lillis and Hugh Grant

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
programme.desc: The amateur detectives attend the grand opening of a museum in their honour, featuring the costumes from all the fake monsters they exposed. The exhibits are stolen by a masked villain, who sets about re-creating all the gang's worst enemies. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr and Linda Cardellini

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: Spooky couple Gomez and Morticia hire a nanny to look after their new baby son - and stop him suffering an early death at the hands of his jealous elder siblings. Romance soon blossoms between the new childminder and Uncle Fester, but he does not realise she is planning to kill him once she has got hold of the family fortune. Comedy sequel, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci and Joan Cusack

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: As a young boy, Willy Wonka inherits a love of chocolate from his mother. When she dies, Willy pursues his dream of opening a chocolate shop in the arcade where confectionery titans Slugworth, Fickelgruber and Prodnose have boutiques. The three entrepreneurs secretly bribe the Chief of Police to thwart Willy's ambitions. Co-writer/director Paul King's fantasy adventure, starring Timothee Chalamet, Calah Lane, Olivia Colman and Hugh Grant

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: The Daughters of Atlas, aka Hespera, Kalypso and Anthea, arrive on Earth in search of stolen magic. Comedy sequel, starring Anjelica Huston, Raul Julia, Christopher Lloyd, Christina Ricci and Joan Cusack

programme.title: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl struggles to cope with the torments of growing up, fitting in and finding a boyfriend. Tired of being a social outcast, she plans to throw the perfect birthday party to win the respect of her peers. Comedy drama based on Louise Rennison's series of novels, starring Georgia Groome, Alan Davies, Karen Taylor and Aaron Taylor-Johnson

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: Unassuming hobbit Bilbo Baggins is pulled out of his comfortable life when Gandalf the wizard volunteers him for a dangerous quest. He joins a party of dwarves who are on a mission to reclaim their lost homeland, which has been taken over by a dragon. When the group journeys into the Misty Mountains, Bilbo becomes separated from the dwarves and falls into a cave, where he finds himself confronted by Gollum and forced to play a riddle game. It is set in Middle-earth 60 years before the events of The Lord of the Rings and is the first part of Peter Jackson's fantasy adventure trilogy based on JRR Tolkien's novel, starring Martin Freeman, Ian McKellen, Richard Armitage, James Nesbitt, Ken Stott, Cate Blanchett, Ian Holm and Christopher Lee

programme.title: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: In his quest for world domination, a power-mad Persian cat plots to sabotage a scientist's plans to cure all humans who are allergic to dogs. A heroic puppy joins a force of canine secret agents to foil his schemes. Comedy, starring Jeff Goldblum and Elizabeth Perkins, and featuring the voices of Tobey Maguire, Alec Baldwin, Susan Sarandon and Sean Hayes

programme.title: Wonka

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Peter Pan, who has finally grown up and is now a married lawyer with a family of his own, is whisked away by Tinkerbell to Neverland, where he must learn to fly again if he is to save his children from the clutches of Captain Hook. Steven Spielberg's fantasy adventure, with Robin Williams, Dustin Hoffman, Julia Roberts, Bob Hoskins and Maggie Smith

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A hi-tech computer chip has a bizarre effect on a squad of toy soldiers, causing mayhem for their owner as the miniature marauders engage in a series of scaled-down skirmishes. Children's adventure mixing live action and computer animation, starring Kirsten Dunst, Denis Leary and Gregory Smith, with the voices of Tommy Lee Jones, Frank Langella, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Christina Ricci

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: A Jewish lawyer looking forward to his retirement is pressured by his ailing mother to organise one last family holiday. Fulfilling her wish means reuniting his grown-up children, who have all gone their separate ways and cannot stand each other. Comedy drama, starring Timothy Spall, Honor Blackman, James Callis and Rhona Mitra

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show -- a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.desc: The T-virus unleashed by the evil Umbrella Corporation has spread to every corner of the globe, infesting the planet with zombies, demons and monsters. Alice, a former Umbrella employee turned rogue warrior, joins her friends on a last-chance mission to storm the company's headquarters located deep underneath what used to be Raccoon City. Vowing revenge, Bourne sets out to prove his innocence and bring the culprits to justice, but he has to evade CIA head Pamela Landry, who is convinced he is guilty.
